model_type.name: miniresnet
model_type.n_stacks: 1, 2 or 3 for pretrained versions, else any integer (warning : anything above 3 probably won't fit on an STM32.

model_type.name: miniresnetv2
model_type.n_stacks: 1, 2 or 3 for pretrained versions, else any integer (warning : anything above 3 probably won't fit on an STM32.

model_type.name: yamnet
model_type.embedding_size: 256, 512 or 1024. Can only be used as a pretrained model
